Articles.Content: I place a few hills for sale on the habitable moon.

I disapprove of your extortionary prices and spacefold a Casaba-Howitzer with an array of bomb-pumped grasers inside the shield. Whether your hill exists any longer or not is irrelevant, because you certainly do not.

I take a hill on that moon. It is mine.
You cannot spacefold inside the shield. My main hill and your hill. Also, the prices are, like $5
One buys your hill for $10. You couldn't resist the temptation.

Those are 10 fake dollars, get out.

Hill's belonging to minmus still
I am selling other hills besides mine. My hill.

great

Great what? I will hang you for your insolence.

my hill.

it has a shield

the hill alliance's hill.

The hills have eyes.

Eyes' hills.

that's just nonsense

still the hill alliance's hill
I rip space-time. My hill.
The DVD is corrupted,  the siterip is damaged.

i know the password to get inside. 

the hill alliance's hill with anti-space ripple shields.
Without space inside, the Hill Alliance gets cramped and crumps for help.
I betray the hill alliance, and activate the self destruct on their hill. All of the planet is destroyed and I build a concrete bunker. My hill.
The concrete bunker lacks normal bunks. You feel cold sitting on a concrete bunk and leave the concrete bunker.

I travel back in time by running at Mach ten and take the origional hill. Because science.

My hill.

that mod is outdated

i get a delorean  and go to when none of you existed

and with minmus deep  i form an alliance and keep ze hill

Oh wait, [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) doesn’t exist yet. Shame.

I predate the universe. My hill, after I pry It’s ownership from your cold, dead fingers.
I wait until you exist and I punch you in the face. My hill.
[@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/), i thought you were helping us. anyway, my hill too!
